content:
Oregon sprinter Kyree King strides across the finish line winning first place in the 100m final PERIOD The University of Oregon hosts the PAC  Track and Field Championships at Hayward Field in Eugene Ore PERIOD on Sunday May   PERIOD Phillip QuinnEmerald

Oregon is running out of ways to win titles PERIOD

On Saturday the Ducks climbed on the back of senior newcomer Kyree King who captured titles in the  and 200meter dashes to lead Oregon to its 11thstraight conference crown PERIOD King became the first Duck to sweep the sprint eventssince Roscoe Cookin  and his windaided 100meter time of . seconds is the fastest ever by a Duck PERIOD

Not bad for his first time ever competing at Hayward Field PERIOD

Unbelievable Oregon head coach Robert Johnson said of King PERIOD He had been doing really well leading into this PERIOD To put it all together and run those races there PERIOD  Its kind of creating a little innersquad rivalry there between him and Marcus Chambers. the Ducks finished the day with  points a convincing . points ahead of runnerup USC who were expected to at least give the Ducks a fight for the title PERIOD

Perenniallya dominantdistance school Oregon held true to tradition and scored 44points in five distance events PERIOD But it was King who finished as the Ducks highpoint scorer PERIOD Its also King who gives Oregonfans a reason to pay attention to events shorter than  meters PERIOD

Weve got a lot of tradition here in the other events that we love and we value Johnson said PERIOD To be able to be wellrounded and balanced and have those other kids step up in those other events is awesome. oregon sprinter Marcus Chambers trails Arizona sprinter Zakee Washington before finishing second in the 400m final PERIOD The University of Oregon hosts the PAC  Track and Field Championships at Hayward Field in Eugene Ore PERIOD on Sunday May   PERIOD Phillip QuinnEmerald

In both sprint events King wasfollowed closely by an Oregon teammate PERIOD Chambers . took second in the  while Damarcus Simpson . finished as runnerup in the  PERIOD

I mean the girls speak for themselves King said of Oregons sprinting dominance on the womens side PERIOD But I wanna come out here and try to propel the mens sprint team to be up there as well PERIOD Im glad I was able to do that too. oregon began racking up points early in the day before track events even began PERIOD The Ducks got a huge shot in the arm from senior thrower Ryan HunterSims who won the discus title in dramatic fashion PERIOD Sitting in second placeafter four throws HunterSimms unleashed a  foot  inch heave on his final attempt to win the event PERIOD In addition to HunterSims victory Cullen Prena and Drake Brennan placed fourth and sixth in the event PERIOD

Exceeding expectations became a common theme for Oregons athletes throughout Sunday afternoon PERIOD Braxton Canady finished second in the 110meter hurdles with a time of . seconds andMick Stanovsek stole a fourthplace finish in the 800meter run PERIOD

All of you always talk about the people who win Johnson said PERIOD But those unsung heroesRyan HunterSimmss there with the comeback victory  those fifth sixth seventh points those definitely make a difference in these championship runs PERIOD Were going to definitelyneed those over these next few months. by the time the meet was down to just two remaining events the Ducks held a comfortable enough lead that Johnson told Chambers that he would hold him out of the dreaded 4400meter relay if he ran the open  PERIOD

Oregon will get a brief break before the Ducks head to Austin Texas for the NCAA West Regionals on May  PERIOD

Follow Jarrid Denney on Twitter jarriddenney

The Daily Emerald is the news division of Emerald Media Group University of Oregons independent student media organization PERIOD
